title: PM cautiously optimistic about COP26 progress
content: But there is a long way to go, Boris Johnson says, as world leaders prepare to leave the summit.

title: PM cautiously optimistic about COP26 progress
content: But there is a long way to go, Boris Johnson says, as world leaders prepare to leave the summit.

title: Peers demand changes to pension triple lock freeze
content: The Lords votes to continue raising pensions with earnings, setting up a Commons vote on the issue.

title: Sage scientist Sir Jeremy Farrar steps down
content: He says levels of Covid transmission in the UK are "concerning" as he leaves the advisory group.

title: UK firms forced to plan for low-carbon future
content: Companies will outline how they aim to meet the UK's 2050 net-zero target, under government rules.

title: Johnson apology to minister over wheelchair access
content: UK prime minister says sorry for "confusion" to Israeli minister who was unable to get into COP26.

title: UK boat held by French, despite minster's claim
content: Environment Secretary George Eustice mistakenly said the Cornelis Gert Jan trawler had been released.

title: MPs told to wear masks amid Covid case rise
content: Tours of Parliament have also been cancelled as health body warns of greater risk of transmission.
